medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric abdominal pain following ERCP with cholangiogram and stent placement.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain is described as sharp and constant, making it difficult to sit upright. No nausea or vomiting reported. Symptoms noted after the ERCP procedure.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, BPH, Hepatitis C cirrhosis, Hepatocellular carcinoma, Liver transplant, Ex lap, T-tube placement, ligation of cystic duct, cholangiogram, intraoperative biopsy.
medical_history.family_history: No history of hepatic disease, no familial cancers.
